title: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald
fullTitle: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald (2018)
plot: In an effort to thwart Grindelwald's plans of raising pure-blood wizards to rule over all non-magical beings, Albus Dumbledore enlists his former student Newt Scamander, who agrees to help, though he's unaware of the dangers that lie ahead. Lines are drawn as love and loyalty are tested, even among the truest friends and family, in an increasingly divided wizarding world.
awards: Nominated for 2 BAFTA Film Awards. Another 3 wins & 20 nominations.
stars: Eddie Redmayne, Katherine Waterston, Dan Fogler, Johnny Depp

tagline: The fate of one will change the future of all.

similars.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
similars.fullTitle: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them (2016)
similars.plot: The adventures of writer Newt Scamander in New York's secret community of witches and wizards seventy years before Harry Potter reads his book in school.
similars.stars: Eddie Redmayne, Katherine Waterston, Alison Sudol

similars.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1
similars.fullTitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1 (2010)
similars.plot: As Harry, Ron, and Hermione race against time and evil to destroy the Horcruxes, they uncover the existence of the three most powerful objects in the wizarding world: the Deathly Hallows.
similars.stars: Daniel Radcliffe, Emma Watson, Rupert Grint

similars.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
similars.fullTitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix (2007)
similars.plot: With their warning about Lord Voldemort's return scoffed at, Harry and Dumbledore are targeted by the Wizard authorities as an authoritarian bureaucrat slowly seizes power at Hogwarts.
similars.stars: Daniel Radcliffe, Emma Watson, Rupert Grint

similars.title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
similars.fullTitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire (2005)
similars.plot: Harry Potter finds himself competing in a hazardous tournament between rival schools of magic, but he is distracted by recurring nightmares.
similars.stars: Daniel Radcliffe, Emma Watson, Rupert Grint

similars.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
similars.fullTitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban (2004)
similars.plot: Harry Potter, Ron and Hermione return to Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry for their third year of study, where they delve into the mystery surrounding an escaped prisoner who poses a dangerous threat to the young wizard.
similars.stars: Daniel Radcliffe, Emma Watson, Rupert Grint

similars.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
similars.fullTitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets (2002)
similars.plot: An ancient prophecy seems to be coming true when a mysterious presence begins stalking the corridors of a school of magic and leaving its victims paralyzed.
similars.stars: Daniel Radcliffe, Rupert Grint, Emma Watson

similars.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them 3
similars.fullTitle: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them 3 (2022)
similars.plot: The third installment of the 'Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them' series which follows the adventures of Newt Scamander.
similars.stars: Mads Mikkelsen, Ezra Miller, Katherine Waterston

similars.title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
similars.fullTitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince (2009)
similars.plot: As Harry Potter begins his sixth year at Hogwarts, he discovers an old book marked as "the property of the Half-Blood Prince" and begins to learn more about Lord Voldemort's dark past.
similars.stars: Daniel Radcliffe, Emma Watson, Rupert Grint

similars.title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
similars.fullTitle: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone (2001)
similars.plot: An orphaned boy enrolls in a school of wizardry, where he learns the truth about himself, his family and the terrible evil that haunts the magical world.
similars.stars: Daniel Radcliffe, Rupert Grint, Richard Harris

similars.title: Charlie and the Chocolate Factory
similars.plot: A young boy wins a tour through the most magnificent chocolate factory in the world, led by the world's most unusual candy maker.
similars.stars: Johnny Depp, Freddie Highmore, David Kelly

similars.title: Alice in Wonderland
similars.plot: Nineteen-year-old Alice returns to the magical world from her childhood adventure, where she reunites with her old friends and learns of her true destiny: to end the Red Queen's reign of terror.
similars.stars: Mia Wasikowska, Johnny Depp, Helena Bonham Carter

similars.title: Alice Through the Looking Glass
similars.plot: Alice returns to the whimsical world of Wonderland and travels back in time to help the Mad Hatter.
similars.stars: Mia Wasikowska, Johnny Depp, Helena Bonham Carter
